Componentes

Botones Formulario

Botones

Ejemplos:

<button class="btn-success">Success</button>
<button class="btn-danger">Danger</button>
<button class="btn-info">Info</button>
<button class="btn-warning">Warning</button>
<button class="btn-light">Light</button>
<button class="btn-dark">Dark</button>
<button class="btn-primary">Primary</button>

Botones de contorno

<button class="btn-outln-success">Success</button>
<button class="btn-outln-danger">Danger</button>
<button class="btn-outln-info">Info</button>
<button class="btn-outln-warning">Warning</button>
<button class="btn-outln-light">Light</button>
<button class="btn-outln-dark">Dark</button>
<button class="btn-outln-primary">Primary</button>

Redondeados

<button class="btn-success rounded">Success</button>
<button class="btn-danger rounded">Danger</button>
<button class="btn-info rounded">Info</button>
<button class="btn-warning rounded">Warning</button>
<button class="btn-light rounded">Light</button>
<button class="btn-dark rounded">Dark</button>
<button class="btn-primary rounded">Primary</button>


<button class="btn-outln-success rounded">Success</button>
<button class="btn-outln-danger rounded">Danger</button>
<button class="btn-outln-info rounded">Info</button>
<button class="btn-outln-warning rounded">Warning</button>
<button class="btn-outln-light rounded">Light</button>
<button class="btn-outln-dark rounded">Dark</button>
<button class="btn-outln-primary rounded">Primary</button>

Tamaños

<button class="btn-primary btn-sm">Small</button> 
<button class="btn-primary">Normal</button> 
<button class="btn-primary btn-lg">Large</button>

<button class="btn-outln-info btn-sm">Small</button> 
<button class="btn-outln-info">Normal</button> 
<button class="btn-outln-info btn-lg">Large</button>

<button class="btn-success btn-sm rounded">Small</button> 
<button class="btn-success rounded">Normal</button> 
<button class="btn-success btn-lg rounded">Large</button>

<button class="btn-outln-danger btn-sm rounded">Small</button> 
<button class="btn-outln-danger rounded">Normal</button> 
<button class="btn-outln-danger btn-lg rounded">Large</button>
